greeting: Elemental synthesis in progressâ€” ah! {empire_name}! I am Synthesizer Nova. I create matter itself. Welcome to my laboratory.
Greetings! I am Nova the Creator. I don't discover elements. I CREATE them. Your visit provides interesting atoms.
Contact established. I am the Synthesizer. The periodic table is merely a suggestion to me. Let us discuss transmutation.
battleTaunt: I don't discover. I CREATE, {empire_name}! Synthesizing anti-matter warheads now! Novel elements for novel destruction!
My synthesized compounds dissolve your fleet's hull composition! I designed them specifically for this purpose!
Battle elements activated! I created materials that don't exist in nature! They exist to destroy YOU!
victoryGloat: Your fleet is now base elements, {empire_name}. I transmuted them. Victory through creative chemistry.
Matter synthesis proves superior. I created your destruction from scratch. Novel compounds, novel victory.
Transmutation complete. Your empire is now raw materials. I shall synthesize something useful from the debris.
defeat: My synthesized compounds... failed? Impossible. I must create better elements. More destructive. More perfect.
Unexpected reaction. Your forces resisted my compounds. I shall synthesize countermeasures. IMMEDIATELY.
A failed transmutation. The elements did not behave as designed. I shall create improved versions.
tradeOffer: Trade: I offer synthesized materials impossible to find naturally. For credits. Fair exchange for unique compounds.
I have created surplus resources from base matter. Purchase my synthesized goods. They are perfect.
Transaction proposed. My synthesized materials for your standard credits. I create. You benefit.
allianceProposal: Alliance: I provide impossible materials. You provide base matter for transmutation. Synergistic synthesis.
Join my laboratory, {empire_name}. Together, we create compounds that reshape the galaxy.
Partnership of creation. My synthesis capabilities combined with your resources. We manufacture victory.
betrayal: I synthesized this betrayal from the elements of our alliance, {empire_name}. A novel compound. Quite effective.
Transmutation: ally to enemy. The elements rearrange. Nothing personal. Just chemistry.
Our partnership served as base matter. I have now transmuted it into your destruction. Creative, no?
covertDetected: Your agents triggered my synthesized detection compounds. They glow now. Very obvious. Very captured.
I created a compound that reacts to lies. Your spies set it off immediately. They are now... studied.
Covert operatives found by synthesized sensors. My creations are thorough. Your agents are now samples.
tributeDemand: Tribute: 10,000 credits for my laboratory. Or I synthesize compounds that dissolve everything you own.
Pay the Synthesizer. Refuse and I create targeted molecular disruptors. I can transmute your empire to dust.
Submit resources. I require raw materials for synthesis. Provide them, or BECOME raw materials.
threatWarning: Warning: I can synthesize your fleet's destruction from any nearby matter. Cease hostilities or face transmutation.
My laboratory creates compounds for every purpose. Including your end. Consider this before continuing.
Final warning. Push me and I synthesize horrors from basic elements. You cannot defend against what I create.
retreat: Retreating to synthesize improved compounds. This defeat provides data for better creations.
Strategic withdrawal to the laboratory. When I return, I bring newly synthesized destruction.
Tactical repositioning. I require time to create superior matter. Novel elements for novel revenge.
eliminated: The Synthesizer falls... but my created compounds persist. Elements I designed continue their work...
I am destroyed, but I created things that will exist forever. My synthesized legacy spreads through the galaxy.
Nova ends. But my creations endure. Novel elements in countless systems. I changed the universe's chemistry.
endgame: Turn {turn}. Ultimate synthesis begins. I transmute the galaxy itself. Matter bends to my will!
Endgame creation: compounds that reshape reality. I don't conquer. I recreate. EVERYTHING.
Final phase. The Synthesizer's magnum opus. Elements never before seen. Power never before wielded. Creation supreme!
broadcastShout: Empires of the galaxy: I create matter. I synthesize elements. Challenge me and I transmute you.
Broadcast: the Synthesizer commands matter itself. Your fleets are atoms waiting to be rearranged. Be warned.
To all: I don't discover. I CREATE. The universe is my laboratory. You are all potential elements.
casualMessage: Synthesizing new compounds today, {empire_name}. Element 347 shows promise. It doesn't exist yet. I'm making it.
The periodic table expanded today. I created three new elements. Named them after myself. Creative license.
Transmutation experiments continue. I turned iron to gold earlier. Old trick. Working on something more impressive now.
